title: Why did Mythbusters get cancelled? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question: Why did Mythbusters get cancelled? Because Jamie Hyneman got tired of the series and of working with co-host Adam Savage. The two men were never friends, and both have made it publicly known that they are very unlikely to work together again in any professional capacity. They apparently had different temperaments and they seem to have been unable to move past their personal differences during the run of the series. Even if they had been able to co-exist, the series was “running out gas” anyway. The “second team” on the series (apparently created and enhanced to give the series’ leads more off time) were let go in the 12th season and Hyneman and Savage appeared alone for the final two seasons. Additionally, the ratings were beginning to sag and that is always a reason for cancellations. Reference: 'Mythbusters' to end with final season: Adam and Jamie react

It ran its course. During the show they pretty much did everything they could with busting myths. They decided to stop the show before they ended up doing ridiculous experiments just to keep the show going. Also the two hosts apparently were not fond of each other.
